definition: thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

pinyin: nian2 du4 gu3 dong1 da4 hui4

sentences.english: The resolution was invalid because the shareholder's meeting was not quorate.
sentences.chinese: 因股東大會不夠法定人數，故該決議無效。

sentences.english: At least we have the aftermath of the Berkshire shareholders' meeting to look forward to.
sentences.chinese: 至少我們還有伯克希爾股東大會的結果可以期待。

sentences.english: Prior to the expiration of a director's term, the shareholders' general committee may not remove him without cause.
sentences.chinese: 董事在任期屆滿前，股東大會不得無故解除其職務。

sentences.english: Wen if want Tang Zheng instead of water to prevent superior landscape on the shareholders meeting.
sentences.chinese: 文若水想讓唐正代替自己去山水開股東大會阻止超羣。
股東大會每半年召開一次。

sentences.english: The chairman is revising his speech to the agm.
sentences.chinese: 董事長正在修改他的年度股東大會上的講話。

sentences.english: The right to vote at shareholder’s meetings for the election of directors shall be observed.
sentences.chinese: 應該遵守股東大會上投票選舉董事的表決權。

sentences.english: The Shareholders will procure that such a general meeting be convened within thirty days of the Leaver's notice.
sentences.chinese: 股東將促使該股東大會在退出方通知後三十日內召開。

sentences.english: Article 101 The annual meeting of the shareholders general assembly shall be convened once a year.
sentences.chinese: 第一百零一條股東大會應當每年召開一次年會。

pinyin: gu3 dong1 te4 bie2 da4 hui4
shou3 ci4 gong1 kai1 zhao1 gu3

definition: China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC)/abbr. for 中國證券監督管理委員會|中国证券监督管理委员会
to ask sb to resign from a post
Shenzhen Stock Exchange, abbr. to 深交所[Shen1 Jiao1 suo3]
pinyin: Shen1 zhen4 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3
